READ_THIS_FIRST.instruction_for_ai: DO NOT calculate totals from individual activities. Use the pre-calculated values in 'summary' and 'weekly_summary' sections below. These are already computed accurately from the API data.

summary.note: Duration calculated from API moving_time field. Minor differences (<30s) from Intervals.icu dashboard are normal due to rounding.
